/bin/g++  -g   CMakeFiles/assignment4.dir/BGRSclient.cpp.o CMakeFiles/assignment4.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/assignment4.dir/encoderdecoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/assignment4.dir/MessageEncoderDecoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/assignment4.dir/Protocol.cpp.o CMakeFiles/assignment4.dir/connectionHandler.cpp.o  -o assignment4  -lboost_system -pthread /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_atomic.so.1.71.0 -lpthread
